episode.title: Cut That Mustache With Scissors
episode.rawTitle: 226: ‘Cut That Mustache With Scissors’ With Marco Arment
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Marco Arment returns to the show for a brief discussion about the new MacBook Pro models and the state of Apple's MacBook lineup.
episode.showNotes:
